Description: This flexcard is used to display messages which are passed to it as an array of objects {code, severity, message}.
SampleDataSourceResponse: [{"code":"204","severity":"ERROR","message":"Required attribute missing for T1076516 Child Product 02 02."},{"code":"204","severity":"INFO","message":"This is info message."},{"code":"204","severity":"WARN","message":"This is warn message."}]
Name: cpqRecordMessageList
